p: Synthesis of 1-(2-hydroxyethyl)-3-methylimidazoliumphosphate ( 4) [ 32]. In a MW vial, 0.286 g (1.76 mmol) of 3 and an equimolar amount of TMP (0.3 mL, 1.76 mmol) were placed, and the mixture was irradiated (200 W) for 15 min at 50 °C to yield the desired product 4 in quantitative yield. 1H-NMR (200 MHz, CDCl 3, ppm): δ = 9.73 (s, 1H), 7.57 (m, 1H), 7.42 (m, 1H), 5.85 (bs, 1H), 4.39 (t, 2H, J = 4.7 Hz), 3.91 (s, 3H), 3.76 (t, 2H, J= 4.7 Hz), 3.53 (d, 6H, J = 11.3 Hz).
